nodes.text:
A Fuel transporter was a type of tanker used by the people
of Tammuz-an.
The fuel transporter was propelled by two thrusters and had its cockpit on the bottom of the superstructure. It was equipped with several escape pods and could land on planetary surfaces.

Several of these tankers were used by the Tammuz-an shipping fleet to carry fuel for the R-22 Spearhead starfighter fleet. One such ship, the King's Ransom, was used in a ruse to divert the attention of pirate Gir Kybo Ren-Cha and his gang away from the real transporter headed to Tammuz-an with a desperately needed replenishment of fuel.
